title: Everything and More
text: We will make sure all your requirements are met. These are merely some examples of what you can ask for.

section.title: availability and preference
section.content: We will take into account when each person is available, and their individual preference.

section.title: Staff Communication
section.content: We can take this off of your hands! No more searching when nobody seems to be available for a slot.

section.title: Needs vary by hour
section.content: You can set each hour to have different number of staff members.

section.title: Role and Seniority
section.content: You can set the role and seniority needed per slot

section.title: Short Notices?
section.content: How long in advance should changes be made? That can be customized.

section.title: Changes confirmed by staff
section.content: If you don't want changes to be made silently, let us know!

section.title: Staff responsibility
section.content: Set how many hours each member of staff needs to work. How many night shifts should they work?

section.title: Well deserved break
section.content: How many hours or days should a staff have in between shifts?
